de.tif.jacob.core.data
Interface IDataTableSearchIterateCallback

public interface IDataTableSearchIterateCallback

Callback interface to perform a search and iterate operation on a data table.

Application programmers should provide an implementation of this interface!

Since:
2.10
See Also:
IDataTable.searchAndIterate(IDataTableSearchIterateCallback), IDataTable.searchAndIterate(IDataTableSearchIterateCallback, String), IDataTable.searchAndIterate(IDataTableSearchIterateCallback, de.tif.jacob.core.definition.IRelationSet)

Method Summary
 boolean onNextRecord(IDataTableRecord record)
          This method will be called for each record retrieved until no further records are available or this method returns false to signal that the iteration should be stopped.
 

Method Detail

onNextRecord

boolean onNextRecord(IDataTableRecord record)
                     throws java.lang.Exception
This method will be called for each record retrieved until no further records are available or this method returns false to signal that the iteration should be stopped.

Parameters:
record - the current record retrieved
Returns:
true to provide further records (if existing) or false to stop retrieval of further records.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - in case of any problem
